content.description:
See You, Space Cowboy follows the line of most resistance through the roof of the Cosmic Debris Boulder.

Start on the same holds as

Cowboy Bebop

, but match the slopers on the arete, and flow to the right into the undercling under the roof. Slap a decent pinch on the arete, and bump higher. Bring your right hand onto the face before a mellow move to the lip. This is short, physical, and sustained. Get on this!
content.protection: Two pads to even out the talus.
content.location:
Use the same start as

Cowboy Bebop

. Head right under the roof once matched on the slopers.

content.description: A large move to the sloper on the arete sets you up to grab an incut crimp on the face before going thumb-first to a pinch near the top. Reset your feet, and top this puppy out! The opening moves are the crux.
content.protection: Two pads to even out the landing.
content.location: Start sitting in the large sloper and flat hold tucked underneath the boulder a little bit.
